hero.description: I'm a software developer passionate about Web Technologies and bringing business ideas to life.

about.main: Hello, I'm Rodrigo Moguillansky, a passionate web developer with a background in Supply Chain management. With 8 years of experience in automating processes, constructing and implementing ERP custom software, and optimizing business operations, I bring a distinct perspective to software development. Over the past year and a half, I have dedicated myself to transitioning into web development, focusing on creating impactful solutions for businesses.
